alert.note: Alert for Coahoma; Tunica (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 10:06AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Lee, northern Phillips, northeastern Coahoma and southwestern Tunica Counties through 1100 AM CDT... At 1006 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Holly Grove, or 8 miles southeast of Clarendon, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Marvell, Helena-West Helena, St Francis National Park, Tunica, Lexa, Rondo, Aubrey, Dundee, Lula, Lagrange, Preston Place, Quarles, Austin, Jeffries, Wycamp, Latour, Turkey Scratch, Vineyard, Rich and Helena Crossing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
